attributes.action: Erect a 'fitting', dedicated monument for for Queen Elizabeth II
attributes.additional_details: Because it's the 'right' thing to do. Try saying it's not in public.
attributes.background: Find a suitable place to erect a 'grand' monument for our Queen who reigned for 70 years. The likes of which, never been seen before and never will again.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623549
